Item.sqlserver_body: IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys.indexes WHERE name='I0' AND [object_id]=OBJECT_ID('innovator.VARIABLE')) DROP INDEX [I0] ON [innovator].[VARIABLE] CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_Variable_value] ON [innovator].[VARIABLE] ( [NAME] ASC ) INCLUDE ([VALUE]) ON [PRIMARY]
Item.name: IX_Variable_value
